solution_line_template: Alice was able to stack {initial_plates} + {added_plates_first_batch} = <<{initial_plates}+{added_plates_first_batch}={plates_stacked_initially}>>{plates_stacked_initially} plates she already stacked.

The tower crashes when there are {total_plates_at_crash} plates - {plates_stacked_initially} plates already stacked = <<{total_plates_at_crash}-{plates_stacked_initially}={additional_plates_before_crash}>>{additional_plates_before_crash} plates she was able to stack before the tower crashed.
